jobDescription: Do you want to have an impact? It starts with the Data. We absorb billions of data points a day and transform into a Full Resolution Identity graph. As part of an early stage team, you will make an impact doing outstanding analysis and building powerful dashboards. You will dig into the data to uncover insights and influence decision making across the organization. If you are a results oriented, motivated individual that wants to work on bleeding-edge technology, we saved you a seat on our team!About DrawbridgeDrawbridge is the leading digital identity company, building patented cross-device technology that fundamentally changes the way brands connect with people. We use large-scale AI and machine learning technologies to build democratized solutions for consumer-friendly identity. Our technology is driving the intersect between mar-tech and other categories with applications including advertising, personalization, content management, product recommendations, authentication, and risk detection. Were headquartered in Silicon Valley, backed by Sequoia Capital, Kleiner Perkins Caufield Byers, and Northgate Capital, and have been listed on CNBCs annual Disruptor 50 list of groundbreaking companies twice, named one of Fortunes 50 Companies Leading the AI Revolution, and has been included on the Inc. 500 list of fastest growing companies in America for two consecutive years. For more information visit www.drawbridge.com.What You'll Do Identify opportunities to perform analysis that provide actionable insights to partner teams.Create and maintain automated reports and tools that empower others.Collaborate with cross functional teams to provide recommendations based on data driven insights.Effectively communicate data insights and methodology to a diverse set of stakeholders. Develop frameworks for analysis and build models to help solve complex problems for the business. What You Bring To The Table 2+ Years work experience doing analysis for a technology company.Experience with Hadoop Ecosystem and willingness to learn more (Hive, Spark, Presto ect.).Fluency in SQL. Experience with relational databases (Mysql,Vertica, Redshift ect.).Experience with BI Reporting & Visualization tools. Knowledge of Tableau a big plus.You have a deep understanding of statistics and interest in predictive modeling.You enjoy digging through data and discovering the right metric or graph that you could build a story around.You are a pro-active self starter with a willingness to learn and adjust in a fast-paced working environment.
